name: client-feedback-analyzer
description: Intelligent customer feedback analysis with AI-powered chat interface

scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd python-backend && PYTHONPATH=. uv run uvicorn backend.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.install:all: cd python-backend && uv sync && cd ../frontend && npm install
